name: Moonlight Banggora
description:
Battle waves of enemies with a shotgun that gets stronger as you defeat more of them.

This prototype was developed in one week for the Blackthorn Prod Game Jam #2 with Programming and Audio done by DefinitelyNotAShark

Music was provided by FreeSound

WEBGL version may not work for all users, if you are experiencing a black screen issue, please play the executable version of the game in the meantime.

Joystick controllers are supported.

Use WASD / Left Analog Stick to Move

Use the Spacebar/R1/RB to Shoot

Use ESC / Start to Pause
